last_episode_to_air.name: Downfall
last_episode_to_air.overview: The final days of Saddam as Coalition forces destroy the Iraqi army and take all major cities, including Baghdad. Saddam and his government collapses.

name: Wars Against Saddam
overview: Operation Desert Storm began when Iraq refused to withdraw from Kuwait.  In 100 hours the American-led coalition destroyed the world's fourth largest army. It was one of the most successful assaults in modern warfare.  In 2003, Iraq became a second front in the war on terrorism with Operation Iraqi Freedom.
